findings.title: Improved Validation on Protocol Parameters
findings.description: DeFi protocols typically have a number of system- wide parameters that can be dynamically configured on demand. The `TEH925` token contract is no exception.

findings.title: Trust Issue Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `TEH` implementation, there is a privileged accounts, i.e., `owner`. This account plays a critical role in governing and regulating the system-wide operations.

findings.title: Potential Front-Running/MEV With Reduced Return
findings.description: The `_swapTokensForEth()` function is vulnerable to front-running attacks due to lack of slippage control, resulting in a smaller gain for users.
